hypothesis_content.title: Pre-Trump Address Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes, when BTC 1-hour realized volatility drops below its 24-hour average by >25% within 2 hours preceding a major scheduled political/economic address (e.g., Trump 9PM), a long volatility position entered 30 minutes before the event will generate positive alpha as implied volatility reprices.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Market participants systematically underprice event risk during compression periods in neutral regimes. The 'mysterious traders selling ahead' pattern suggests informed flow anticipating volatility, creating asymmetry for volatility buyers entering just before information release.
entry_conditions: BTC 1h realized volatility < 0.75 * BTC 24h realized volatility
Time between 1.5 and 0.5 hours before scheduled high-impact event

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC 1h realized volatility increases by 40% from entry level
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price moves >2.5% against entry before event start
exit_conditions.time_exit: 2 hours after event start if neither TP/SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 55% of such setups result in continued volatility compression through the event period (realized vol < entry +15%) across 20+ instances.
